title: Tips for Treating Perimenopausal Depression
itunes:title: Tips for Treating Perimenopausal Depression
description:
If your patient has perimenopausal depression, what are the treatment options? This podcast explains different treatment options, such as antidepressants, hormone therapy, and psychotherapy. It also addresses some strategies for managing vasomotor symptoms.

Guest: Vivien Burt, M.D.;
Interviewer: Mohan Gautam, D.O.
Hosts: Jessica Diaz, M.D.; Flavio Guzman, M.D.
